pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, September 23, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the welcoming ceremony with military honours for Prime Minister of Spain Pedro Sánchez.

The Royal Canadian Hussars Armoury
4185 chemin de la Côte-des-Neiges

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.

2:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with Prime Minister of Spain Pedro Sánchez.

Monet Room, Sofitel Montreal Golden Mile Hotel
1155 rue Sherbrooke Ouest  

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting
    • Media are asked to present themselves to the accreditation desk on the second floor no later than 2:00 p.m.

3:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a joint media availability with Prime Minister of Spain Pedro Sánchez.

Paloma Picasso Room, Sofitel Montreal Golden Mile Hotel
1155 rue Sherbrooke Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to present themselves to the accreditation desk on the second floor no later than 3:15 p.m.

5:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an armchair discussion with Prime Minister of Spain Pedro Sánchez at the Canada 2020 Global Progress Summit.

Oval Ballroom, The Ritz-Carlton Hotel
1228 rue Sherbrooke Ouest

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to present themselves to the green room on the second floor no later than 4:30 p.m.
